comment: I can't remember the coure #, but this was 20th Cent. Am. Lit.  We focused on short stories and Dr Yow was phenomenal.  We were one of her final classes before retirement.  I am so fortunate to have crossed paths with this brilliant woman.  I feel honored that she gave me some of her books for my own library.  Happy Retirement, Dr. Yow!

Horrible! She thought that she was teaching at Yale seriously. So much work it should count for two classes. And this is a direct quote. "I teach because you people keep me young, your the connection to the real world." She sucks!
Sweet as pie, extremely helpful, extremely smart.  I miss her classes.
how can you not love dr. yow?!?! she is an awesome teacher. love her style of teaching. challenging yet not mind wringing! take her if you can!
Great professor! Classes are challenging, busy, exciting, fun, interesting! She helped me get into grad school, too! Love her.

she works real hard to make students like her by being funny, but i think she should make more of an effort to give students an intellectual challenge.  grow up.  this isn't a popularity contest in junior high school.
Sacrifices quality for quantity-heavy reading load, but so little time spent discussing the literature. Blase choices in books. Pretentious and dazzled by mediocrity.

she's the sweetest and the best! her assignments (i think) are easy and fun (but i'm an english dork!) i'm in my third class with her. she's got a really fun personality and wants to hear what you have to say, so class is enjoyable.

Top notch instructor!  I've had 4 of her classes, and she really makes the material enjoyable.  Expect quizzes almost daily, and LOTS of reading!  Not hard to understand, and admits when she makes a mistake.  Highly recommended.  But not easy.
Dr. Yow is my favorite teacher! I took her for 4 different classes. She loves her job and it shows. She wants her students to learn and will do all she can to help you. I highly suggest her!
Expect a reading quiz every day.  I think that she is nice, but not fake.  I agree that she does think that she is funny.
Very knowledgeable teacher on regional literature and English concepts. You'll learn a lot from Yow if you show up and participate in class. Isn't that why we're in college - to learn?
Tries too hard to be popular with students.  Avoid her.
